DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure level serum proteins biomarkers cervical cancer patient . We believe marker may useful select patient specific type cancer therapy . These marker may also help predict response therapy , relapse therapy , survival therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Tissue Plasma Biomarkers Lymph Node Involvement Cervical Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: SPECIFIC STUDY AIMS Specific Aim 1 : To use gene expression analysis primary cervical cancer identify gene expression signature predict lymph node metastasis disease . Specific Aim 2 : To predict lymph node metastasis perform multiplex measurement cancer-associated protein cytokine use proximity ligation assay ( PLA ) plasma sample . Specific Aim 3 : To measure circulate human papilloma virus ( HPV ) DNA plasma sample cervical cancer patient use real-time quantitative polymerase chain reaction ( qPCR ) determine ability predict nodal metastasis . Specific Aim 4 : To use deep sequencing evaluate gene sequence difference cervical cancer patient without lymph node metastasis .
DOC.criteria: Patients must know suspected cervical cancer . Age > =18 year . Patients must active cancer time diagnosis . Patients must history hysterectomy . Patients must able give informed consent . Patients must willing undergo biopsy cervical tumor provide tissue study . Patients must complete standardofcare FDGPET/CT prior initiation therapy , assessment lymph node . Pregnant woman
